messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

account ad account end of march february pm ad dear her march kindly asking extend her ad till march thank much kind regards administrator february ad hello date february advised purposes each calendar she needs her accounts active also her active confirmed currently reactivation process please further information assistance needed thank analyst ext hub february re hi allowed remain active without date least review date want requirement verified each calendar please please log trigger review requirement february she needs march confirmed then kind regards information compliance officer extension february hi checked since she trains take over her responsibilities she both thank regards administrator friday february pm re hi about accounts she well thanks friday february pm dear spoke kindly asking her extend her ad since she how log she needs possible without date thank kind regards administrator friday pm re hi has signed required disclosure agreement her ad re please again four weeks needed suggest february disable automatically date want prompt needed kind regards re hi thank signaling recommendation enable until signed assume notify enable thank hi please let re enable today after disclosure agreement has signed hold until received regards analyst ext hub re hi again got confirmation ad re enable her complete activities during also ask added ad re until st disable again required after st come back thread extended must also ask sign form additional disclosure agreement latest version modify wording slightly available next couple days then ask ask sign kind regards information compliance officer extension re hi leave disabled moment come back next action once heard back possible want continue allow because strictly speaking has retired she has resigned going off work competitor continued post retirement knowledge transfer continued least normal cases hence nature question watch update kind regards re hi please advised disabled ad did change sorted please let additional tickets logged order process accounts regards analyst ext hub re importance high hello far gather under contract then she bound by whatnot precedent other methods assuring adheres advise please input until matter resolved please ensure temporarily disabled perform other change her until clarified thank leave notice december thank kind regards administrator thursday december pm re hello please advised fill leaver form her tickets raised her disabled procedure please advise closing person after person has left permitted kind regards analyst ext hub thursday december pm dear forwarding post her resignation please copy further communication related subject order her confirmation regarding status order provide additional information thank regards received information about retirement delay she leave her terminated she available she needs communicate knowledge information upcoming period please let her won terminated thank kind regards administrator

The strong emphasis on enabling, disabling, and reactivating accounts points me towards "Access" as the primary category.
